title: Public S3 Bucket Exposure for PHI Data
description: S3 bucket containing medical records is configured with completely open public access controls
evidence:
block_public_acls = false
block_public_policy = false
ignore_public_acls = false
restrict_public_buckets = false
reasoning: All public access block settings are disabled, allowing unrestricted public access to potentially sensitive healthcare data

title: Unencrypted Database Storing PHI
description: Database storing medical records lacks storage encryption
reasoning: No encryption at rest for database containing sensitive medical information violates HIPAA requirements

title: Unrestricted Database Network Access
description: Database security group allows connections from any IP address
reasoning: Open ingress rule on PostgreSQL port allows potential unauthorized database access from any network

title: Missing S3 Bucket Encryption
description: S3 bucket lacks server-side encryption configuration
reasoning: No explicit encryption mechanism for stored medical records
